person.content:

| Person |
| --- |
| 29,200 |
| 17,200 |
| 7,700 |
| 100 |
| 59,400 |

There are no person entities in the given paragraph. The paragraph only contains numbers, and none of them can be considered as person entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Valid entities:

| Person |
| --- |
| 100 |

The number 100 is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a person. The other numbers (29,200, 17,200, 7,700, 59,400) are not persons and therefore cannot be considered as valid entities.
